name: Focus
description: Adds the Marksman ability to all weapons so that pressing Shift slows down time.

name: Realistic AI
description: Increases AI attentiveness and time spent searching. Three levels of difficulty.

name: The New Army
description: Episode 1 of Mushroom's Special Assignment Pack. Replaces Arrival.

name: A Case Most Peculiar
description: Episode 2 of Mushroom's Special Assignment Pack. Replaces Guided Training.

name: Mission Difficulties
description: Enables extra difficulties on 9 missions. Enables saving in Holiday Hoarders and Hokkaido Snow Festival.

name: Malpractice
description: Replaces the offline mode version of Patient Zero with an ET-style mission: steal the diamonds and kill the Director.

name: CYOA Sapienza
description: Adds a mission to Sapienza where you can choose who to work for, and which objectives to do.

name: Sniper Assassin: Hawke-aido
description: A Hawke's Bay Sniper Assassin-type mission set during sunset.

name: All Missions Offline
description: Adds holiday and sniper missions to the menu when offline. Required for some mods to work.

name: CYOA Marrakesh
description: Replaces A Gilded Cage with a mission where you work for either Crystal Dawn or the pro-democracy group Arab Spring.

name: Suit Replacement Mod
description: Replaces 12 suits with disguises not unlockable in the normal game, as well as sneaking in cut disguises for specific maps.
